com.parkingtycoon.controllers

Class FloorsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.BaseController
      • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.UpdatableController
        • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.FloorsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable

    public class FloorsController
extends UpdatableController
    This class is responsible for providing multiple floors of te simulation world. Also for changing, saving and loading the layout of the tiles of all floors.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FloorsController()
      This constructor will register keyListeners that are used to modify floors.

    • Method Detail

      • inBuildZone

        public static boolean inBuildZone(int x,
                                  int y)
        This method will check if a given position is in the zone where the player is allowed to build.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate
        y - Y-coordinate
        Returns:
        Whether or not the position is in the build zone

      • update

        public void update()
        This update method will make it possible to switch between floors. It is also used to process the players input to modify the layout.

      • floorExists

        private boolean floorExists(int index)
        This method checks if a floor exists
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the floor
        Returns:
        Whether or not the floor exists

      • setCurrentFloor

        private void setCurrentFloor(int index)
        This method will switch the floor that the player is building on and looking at.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the floor

      • moveUpOneFloor

        public void moveUpOneFloor()

        public int getCurrentFloor()
        Returns the index of the currently active floor
        Returns:
        the index of the currently active floor

      • updateBuildings

        public void updateBuildings(int floorIndex)
        This method will notify buildings when the player switched between floors.
        Parameters:
        floorIndex - The floorIndex of the buildings to notify

      • createFloors

        public void createFloors()
        Create some baisc starter floors.

      • createFloor

        private void createFloor(boolean first)
        This method can be used to create a new floor in the game.
        Parameters:
        first - Whether this should be a floor with grass, roads and trees, or a floor of concrete.

      • createEmptyFloor

        private FloorModel createEmptyFloor()
        This method will return a new floor without layout.
        Returns:
        The new empty floor

      • setNewFloorFlag

        private void setNewFloorFlag(FloorModel floor)
        This method will save the coordinates of where new floorTiles have to be placed. It'll also place a green or red flag.
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor the player wants to change the layout of

      • showFlag

        private void showFlag(FloorModel floor,
                      boolean green)
        This method will create a FlagView to visualize the placing of new floorTiles.
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor the flag has to be placed on
        green - Whether the flag should be green or red.

      • placeNewFloorTiles

        private void placeNewFloorTiles(FloorModel floor)
        This method will place new FloorTiles according to the positions of the flags.
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor the tiles have to be placed on

      • checkParkables

        private void checkParkables(FloorModel floor)
        This method will check for each PARKABLE tile if it is accessible.
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor to check on

      • isParkableAccessible

        private boolean isParkableAccessible(FloorModel floor,
                                     int parkableX,
                                     int parkableY)
        This method will check if a individual PARKABLE tile is accessible
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor of the tile
        parkableX - The x-position of the tile
        parkableY - The y-position of the tile
        Returns:
        Whether the PARKABLE tile is accessible

      • toJson

        public void toJson()
        This method wil save the layouts of the floors and the buildings placed on them to a JSON file in the saves/ folder

      • fromJson

        public void fromJson(java.lang.String savePath)
        This method will load floor layouts and buildings from a JSON file.
        Parameters:
        savePath - The path of the local JSON file
